Alias.name: spell speed
set spell
Alias.script:
local spell = matches[2] if spell then MUME.spell = spell end
echo(string.format(" [ spell: '%s' ]\n", MUME.spell or ""))

Alias.name: set spell
Alias.script: switch({ ["spha"] = function() expandAlias("spell harm", false) end, ["splb"] = function() expandAlias("spell lightning bolt", false) end, ["spbh"] = function() expandAlias("spell burning hands", false) end, ["spfb"] = function() expandAlias("spell fireball", false) end, ["spbl"] = function() expandAlias("spell blindness", false) end, ["spsl"] = function() expandAlias("spell sleep", false) end, ["spcs"] = function() expandAlias("spell colour spray", false) end, ["spde"] = function() expandAlias("spell dispel evil", false) end, ["speq"] = function() expandAlias("spell earthquake", false) end, }):case(matches[1])

Alias.name: cast
Alias.script:
local target local command if matches[1] == "sp" then target = "" else target = string.format("%s", MUME.target) end
command = string.format("cast %s '%s' %s", MUME.speed, MUME.spell, target)
send(command)

Alias.name: cast @ target
Alias.script:
local target if matches[2] == "m" then target = MUME.mount or "" else target = MUME.target or "" end local num = matches[3] or "1" local command target = string.format("%s.%s", num, target)
command = string.format("cast %s '%s' %s", MUME.speed, MUME.spell, target)
send(command)

Script.name: init
Script.script: if not MUME then MUME = {} end

Script.name: spells
Script.script: if not MUME.spell then MUME.spell = "lightning bolt" end if not MUME.speed then MUME.speed = "normally" end
